title: Topic 001 Question 174
body: You are about to deploy a new Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system on Google Cloud. The application holds the full database in-memory for fast data access, and you need to configure the most appropriate resources on Google Cloud for this application. What should you do?
options: Provision Compute Engine instances with GPUs attached.
Provision Compute Engine instances with local SSDs attached.
Provision Compute Engine instances with M1 machine type.
